New Records: Chris Jordan became the first England player to take a men's T20I hat-trick
Adil Rashid equalled Stuart Broad's tally of 30 dismissals in T20 World Cups
Key Match Events: Chris Jordan took four wickets from his final five deliveries
Adil Rashid bowled Aaron Jones and Nitish Kumar with googlies
Jos Buttler scored 83 not out from 38 deliveries and hit five sixes in an over
Post-Match Reflections: Chris Jordan's hat-trick and overall figures of 4 for 10 secured his place in history
Adil Rashid was unplayable, conceding just 10 runs from his four boundary-less overs
Corey Anderson struggled, scoring 29 from 72 deliveries
Miscellaneous Highlights: England won by 10 wickets with 62 balls remaining
Jos Buttler's innings gave England faith in the team combination
The target of 116 needed to be chased down in 18.4 overs
